children.markdown:
Timeline chart example. The x-axis is defined as a timeline. This causes dates with no value to be included with a value of 0:

```
{
  "widget": "chart",
  "query": "orders-over-time",
  "database": "northwind",
  "chart": "bar",
  "style": {
    "elements.bar.backgroundColor": "green",
    "plugins.title.text": "Orders in February",
    "plugins.title.display": "true",
    "scales.x.type": "time",
    "scales.x.min": "1998-02-01",
    "scales.x.max": "1998-02-28"
  }
}
```
